## DataViewJSTools.rssReadingList() method

Create a collapsible list of reading tasks with on-demand rendering.

If the given feed has no reading tasks which have the state matching the `read` parameter, no UI is generated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rssReadingList(items: TPageRecords, read: boolean, expand: boolean, header?: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

items


</td><td>

[TPageRecords](./rss-tracker.tpagerecords.md)


</td><td>

The RSS items to get the reading tasks from


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

read


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

`false` to collect unchecked (unread) reading tasks; `true` otherwise.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

expand


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

`undefined` render immediately using a generic dataview table; `true` render table immediately and expand the table by default; `false` to collapse the table by default and render the table on-demand.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

header


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional header text to display for the expander control.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
